text: Hello! My name is Ben Southall,
winner of the Best Job in the World competition.

For the last few years 
I've been leaving the dream here in Australia
as the care taker of the Great Barrier Reef
Island hopping, Scuba diving, kayaking, and blogging from the beaches.
Life has been pretty sweet...
Up until then, life was a bit more basic:
I was working with my nose to the grindstone in a boring job.
A bit lost in life, unsure of my direction, with far too much energy.
If this sounds like you,
and you'd rather meet lots of people
and are up for some serious world travel,
then the Havana Club Gap Year is what you're looking for.
It will change your life!
Imagine travelling around the world for a year,
living the Havana Club 12 lives,
in 12 countries,
having 12 utterly incredible experiences.
From touring across the vast country of Canada with a jazz band
to watching the world go by
and writing about it on the famous Transiberian Railway.
It's the stuff that dreams are made of!
To find out more about how to enter the competition,
visit your local Havana Club Facebook page.
You'll need to upload a video of yourself answering 2 questions:

What three things would you be happy 
to leave at home during the gap year?
And the second question:
What three things would you have to take with you in your luggage?
So get your camera gear out,
and get your video uploaded,

and it could be you we're meeting in Havana later this year
for the grand final.
Wishing you all the best of luck.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some work to do.
Goodbye!
